thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 40 3
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
Meanwhile ordered goods at TomTop for approximately 160€.
I am very satisfied
- with good qualitity
- response time of Tomtop support
- meaningful answers (support)
- with delivery time
- with price level
First had problem with one product because of a fault:
- Tomtop answered within 48hours to my support (warranty) request,
- got clear answer on return information needed and procedure.
- could return product to Hamburg which is good, because I life in Germany
- after Tomtop received & proofed good returned, got request whether I want to have a replacement or money back.
Greetings Michael
